title: Asking pixel 3 xl assistant to "play music on pandora" fails with an error message
content: asking pixel 3 xl assistant to "play music on pandora" fails with a black screen message: "Sorry, we were unable to find any matching tracks.", followed by another red screen message: "We're having unexpected technical difficulties".      Note: I have Pandora as my default music service in the assistant's settings, and manually opening the Pandora application works fine, it only gets an error if I ask the assistant to do it.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
